product_overview: AI Grid Trading Platform is a comprehensive web-based trading application that enables users to manage portfolios, create and operate AI-powered grid trading bots, conduct backtesting, and execute real-time trades via an integrated interface. It supports secure authentication, admin management of trading templates, and provides alerts and analytics to enhance user trading experience.
core_goals: Provide secure and seamless user authentication including OAuth support.
Allow users to view and analyze portfolio and trading statistics on a unified dashboard.
Enable creation, management, and control of AI trend and Grid trading bots.
Offer AI-recommended grid bot templates with backtesting capabilities to optimize trading strategies.
Facilitate real-time trading with live data charts and position management.
Provide historical trading data and performance analytics for informed decision making.
Allow admin users to manage grid bot templates through CRUD operations and backtesting.
Implement alerts and notifications for price changes and trade events.
Support user settings management including API key handling and preferences.
Ensure robust real-time data updates using WebSocket connections.
key_features: User Authentication with JWT and OAuth (Google, Kakao) support.
Main Dashboard displaying portfolio overview, balance, and trading stats.
Bot Management interface to create, start, stop, and monitor AI Trend and Grid bots.
Collection of AI-recommended Grid Bot Templates with backtesting functionality.
Admin interface for Grid Bot Template management with create, update, delete and backtest features.
Backtesting engine for grid trading strategies using historical candle data and performance metrics.
Real-time Trading view with TradingView chart integration and position management.
Trading History page showing past trades and analytics.
Trading Strategy configuration and management tools.
Alerts and Notifications system to keep users informed of trading events.
User Settings page supporting API key management and user preferences.
WebSocket based real-time data updates for trading.
Error handling improvements and API consistency across frontend and backend.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in using email/password or OAuth providers like Google and Kakao.
User accesses the dashboard to view portfolio balance and trading summaries.
User navigates to Bot Management to create new AI Trend or Grid bots, configure them, and start/stop bots.
User explores and applies AI-recommended grid bot templates and runs backtests to optimize parameter selections.
Admin accesses Grid Template Manager to manage and validate templates with CRUD operations and backtesting.
User performs real-time trades using an interactive trading interface with live TradingView charts.
User reviews historical trading data and performance analytics in the Trading History section.
User sets trading strategies in the Strategy Management area and configures alerts and notifications for price changes or trade status.
User updates personal settings, manages API keys, and preferences.
Real-time data and notifications are received via WebSocket connections ensuring timely updates.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication flow including OAuth login and JWT token handling.
Dashboard displays correct portfolio data and trading statistics reflecting backend data.
Bots can be created, started, stopped, and managed with data persisting correctly.
Grid bot templates can be applied and backtested with accurate performance results.
Admin functions can create, update, delete templates and run backtests without errors.
Trading interface reflects live market data and allows users to open, close and manage positions correctly.
Historical trading data is accurate and matches recorded trade information.
Strategy and alert configurations are saved and trigger correctly in response to market events.
User settings including API key management work as expected with backend persistence.
WebSocket connection handles disconnections gracefully, reconnects, and updates data in real-time.
Frontend and backend APIs align in schema, endpoints, and error handling following debugging checklist items.
